products.name: Insignia Portable Air Conditioner - 12,000 BTU - White
products.shortDescription: This Insignia portable air conditioner provides you with the relief you need during those long, hot summer days. Its 12,000 BTU cooling capacity is capable of cooling a room that's 420 sq. ft. in size. It also features a 24-hour delay timer and an automatic swing function to help circulate the cool air.

products.name: Insignia 10,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (NS-AC10P6WH-C)
products.shortDescription: The Insignia NS-AC10P6WH-C portable air conditioner provides you with the relief you need during those long, hot summer days. Its 10,000 BTU cooling capacity is capable of cooling a room 250 to 350 sq. ft. in size. It also features a 24-hour delay timer and an automatic swing function to help circulate the cool air.

products.name: Danby 12000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (DPA120CB5WP)
products.shortDescription: Keep cool on sweltering days with the Danby 12,000BTU air conditioner. This portable unit can cool rooms up to 550 square feet and features a direct-drain system that can handle 24L per 24 hours. An automatic on/off feature lets you program the unit to start and stop according to your schedule for convenient use.

products.name: Miele Compact C1 Celebration Canister Vacuum - Canary Yellow
products.shortDescription: Say goodbye to dust on your hard floors and low pile carpets with the help of the Miele Compact C1 Celebration canister vacuum. This compact vacuum boasts a 1200W motor for powerful suction, and an AirClean System that filters out 99.9% of fine dust. A bonus mini hand turbo brush makes it easy to clean furniture and car interiors.

products.name: Dyson V8 Absolute Cordless Stick Vacuum - Yellow
products.shortDescription: Clean with absolute ease and effectiveness thanks to the Dyson V8 Absolute cordless stick vacuum. Not only does it bring back a lot of the same great features from the V6, it also sports some key enhancements including a more powerful motor, stronger suction power, longer battery life, and an even more effective direct-drive cleaner head.

products.name: Danby 8500 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (DPA085CB1GDB)
products.shortDescription: Keep cool on sweltering days with the Danby 8,500BTU air conditioner. This portable unit can cool rooms up to 350 square feet and features a direct-drain system that can handle 23L per 24 hours. An automatic on/off feature lets you program the unit to start and stop according to your schedule for convenient use.

products.name: De'Longhi Pinguino 14,000 BTU Air-to-Air Portable Air Conditioner (PACAN140HPECB) - Black
products.shortDescription: With this De'Longhi Pinguino air-to-air portable air conditioner, you can cool a room, dehumidify it and purify the air. Featuring an innovative condensate recirculation system, this unit recycles condensation in the machine so there are no drips or bucket. It also has a 4105W heat pump function, so you can warm up a room and use the unit all year round.

products.name: Haier 14,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (HPF14XCM-B) - Black/Silver
products.shortDescription: The Haier 14000 BTU Portable dual-hose air conditioner is designed for spot cooling. The dual-hose design boosts the cooling efficiency when compared to single-hose models. It easily installs into an open window with the window exhaust kit and features cool, fan and dehumidify modes to meet all your interior climate control needs.

products.name: Honeywell Quiet Set 8-Speed Oscillating Tower Fan - 33" - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the comfort of a quiet, cooling breeze with the Honeywell Quiet Set tower fan. With Quiet Set technology and 8-speed controls you can get the optimal cooling with adjustable quiet levels. It offers 75 degrees of oscillation for a wide cooling area, plus its space-saving design makes it the ideal fan to keep any room cool, regardless of size.

products.name: Dyson V8 Animal Cordless Stick Vacuum - Nickel
products.shortDescription: Have pets at home? It wouldn't show at all after using the Dyson V8 Animal cordless stick vacuum. Not only does it bring back a lot of the same great features from the V6, it also sports some key enhancements including a more powerful motor, stronger suction power, longer battery life, and an even more effective direct-drive cleaner head.

products.name: Haier Window Air Conditioner - 8000 BTU - White
products.shortDescription: Get sweet relief from the stuffy heat with the Haier 8000 BTU window air conditioner. It offers easy operation and hassle-free maintenance with an easy access washable filter. It features an energy saving mode, dehumidify function, and offers 24 hour on/off delay and sleep mode. It includes a full function remote with electronic controls.

products.name: Danby Window Air Conditioner - 5000 BTU - Grey
products.shortDescription: Keep your cool all summer long with this 5,000 BTU window air conditioner by Danby. With a powerful 2-way fan it's capable of bringing a 150-square-foot room to chilly levels in no time. The manual controls let you adjust the variable temperature to between 17 and 30 degrees Celsius.

products.name: Samsung 5.2 Cu. Ft. High Efficiency Front Load Washer (WF45K6200AZ) - Blue Sapphire
products.shortDescription: Laundry day will seem like less of a chore with the Samsung WF45K6200 front load washer. It features a 5.2 cu. ft. capacity, so it can wash more clothes at once. The AddWash feature lets you add a missed item to your wash, saving you time. Vibration Reduction technology delivers quiet operation, letting you do other things without distraction. (Pedestal not inluded).

products.name: Honeywell Quiet Set 5-Speed Oscillating Tower Fan - 33" - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the comfort of a quiet, cooling breeze with the Honeywell Quiet Set tower fan. With Quiet Set technology and 5-speed controls you can get the optimal cooling with adjustable quiet levels. It offers 75 degrees of oscillation for a wide cooling area, plus its space-saving design makes it the ideal fan to keep any room cool, regardless of size.

products.name: Honeywell Comfort Control Oscillating Tower Fan - 38" - Black
products.shortDescription: Get a quiet cooling breeze with the Honeywell 38" Comfort Control tower fan. It has a oscillating feature that offers a wider cooling area and quiet operation lets you enjoy the fan without loud disrupting fan noise. An LED display with touch button controls lets you navigate settings for your ideal cooling set up. It also has a built-timer.

products.name: Dyson V6 Slim Cordless Stick Vacuum - White
products.shortDescription: Cleaning doesn't need to be a chore with Dyson's V6 Slim cordless vacuum. It features a 2-tier cyclone system that captures fine dust, and it converts into a handheld vacuum, perfect for cleaning your car or getting into other tight areas. The mini motorized tool is perfect for removing pet hair and ground-in-dirt from furniture or car upholstery.

products.name: Haier Portable Air Conditioner - 10,000 BTU - White
products.shortDescription: Get sweet relief from the stuffy heat with the Haier 10,000 BTU single-hose portable air conditioner. It offers easy installation, quiet operation and hassle-free maintenance with a slide-out washable filter. It features auto-evaporation for extended operation and has 3 fan speeds and cooling settings to suit your temperature preference.

products.name: Dyson Pure Cool Link Tower Air Purifier with HEPA Filter - Blue
products.shortDescription: Escape allergies when in your home with the Dyson Pure Cool Link purifier. This tower fan removes 99.7% of allergens and unpleasant odours. Designed for year-round use, this purifier easily cleans the air in cold weather, and keeps you cool in the summer with fresh purified air. The Dyson Link app lets you remotely monitor air quality in your home.

products.name: Insignia 5.8 Cu. Ft. Upright Freezer (NS-UZ58WH6-C) - White
products.shortDescription: Satisfy your frozen food storage needs with the Insignia upright freezer. Boasting a large 5.8 cu. ft. capacity and 5 built-in cabinet shelves, this freezer offers plenty of room for your ice cream, meats, pizzas, and more.

products.name: Haier 8000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (HPB08XCM)
products.shortDescription: If you can't stand the heat, don't get out of the kitchen. Instead, let this portable air conditioner from Haier cool you down. Thanks to 8,000BTUs, you can stay in any room you like that's up to 250 square feet.

products.name: Samsung 7.5 Cu. Ft. Electric Steam Dryer (DV45K6200EZ) - Blue Sapphire
products.shortDescription: Laundry day will seem like less of a chore with the Samsung DV45K6200 electric dryer. It features a 7.5 cu. ft. capacity that allows you to dry more clothes at once. The built-in moisture sensor ensures that your clothes are dried to perfection and Multi-Steam freshens clothes and helps remove wrinkles, so you'll spend less time ironing. (Pedestal not inluded).

products.name: Haier 8,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (HPY08XCM) - White
products.shortDescription: Keep small, contained rooms cool and comfortable with the Haier 8000 BTU Portable air conditioner. It easily installs into an open window with the window exhaust kit. This single hose model features cool, fan and dehumidify modes to meet all your interior climate control needs.

products.name: Insignia 1.7 Cu. Ft. Bar Fridge (NS-CF17BK6-C) - Black
products.shortDescription: Keep your cold drinks and snacks conveniently close at hand with this 18.7" bar fridge from Insignia. Featuring a 1.7 cu. ft. capacity, this fridge sports a compact, space-saving design that makes it the perfect addition to any number of living spaces, from a dorm room to a basement rec room.

products.name: LG Countertop Microwave - 1.1 Cu. Ft. - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Cook, reheat, and defrost foods with ease using the LG 1.1-cubic-foot countertop microwave. Featuring a moisture dome and turntable, this microwave keeps your meals moist as you cook, continually rotating it for even results.

products.name: Haier Serenity Series Window Air Conditioner - 8000 BTU - White
products.shortDescription: Keep cool with the Haier 8000 BTU Serenity Series window air conditioner, a remarkably quiet machine that offers easy operation and hassle-free maintenance. It cools rooms up to 350 sq. ft. and features digital temperature adjustment and a full function remote.

products.name: Insignia 24" 9.9 Cu. Ft. Top Freezer Refrigerator (NS-RTM10WH7-C) - White
products.shortDescription: Keep all of your supermarket finds fresh or frozen with this Insignia 9.9 cu. ft. refrigerator. It features a top-mount freezer that keeps all of your favourite frozen treats at a convenient level. The fresh food compartment has 4 full-width, spill-proof shelves, 4L bottle storage bin, and 2 crisper drawers to help your fruits and veggies stay fresh.

products.name: Insignia 1.6 Cu. Ft. Portable Washer (NS-TWM16WH7-C) - White
products.shortDescription: Add the convenience of a portable washer to your small living space. This portable top load washer with a 1.6 cu. ft. capacity features a compact design which is ideal for small spaces such as dorms or small apartments. It has 5 wash cycles, 3 water temperature settings, and 3 water level options so your clothes get the best clean possible.

products.name: De'Longhi Pinguino 12000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (PACN120E)
products.shortDescription: Cool the air while removing moisture with the De'Longhi Pinguino PAC N120E portable air conditioner. Ideal for rooms up to 450 square feet, this air conditioner features 3 fan speeds, a dehumidifier, and a 12-hour timer. Its energy-saving design keeps you cool without causing a spike in your power bill.

products.name: Ecohouzing Portable Air Conditioner - 14000 BTU - White
products.shortDescription: This Ecohouzing portable air conditioner does it all so you stay comfortable year-round. It beats the heat with a 14,000BTU air conditioner and keeps you warm and dry with a built-in 11,000BTU heater and dehumidifier. Designed to cool or heat rooms up to 700 sq. ft., it features 3 fan speeds and 2-way adjustable air direction for even air distribution.

products.name: De'Longhi Whisper 14000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner (PACAN140HPEWC)
products.shortDescription: Keep cool summer days and warm on winter nights with the De'Longhi Whisper Cool portable air conditioner. This portable unit works as an air conditioner, fan, dehumidifier, and heater all in one, making it ideal for year-round use. A BioSilver air filter keeps the air clean, while the whisper cool function ensures quiet operation.

products.name: Insignia 5.0 Cu. Ft. Chest Freezer (NS-CZ50WH6-C) - White
products.shortDescription: This Insignia chest freezer lets you store your frozen groceries that don't fit in your fridge. Boasting a 5 cu. ft. capacity, this freezer provides ample room for your ice cream, pizzas, meats, and more. A removable storage basket gives you quick access to smaller items, while the mechanical controls allow you to make adjustments easily.

products.name: Dyson Tower Fan (AM07) - Black/Nickel
products.shortDescription: Stay breezy instead of getting hot under the collar. Dyson keeps you cool, calm and collected with a smooth and consistent delivery of temperate air driven through the AM07's strong bladeless system. Whisper-quiet operation and a sleek aesthetic compliment the contrastingly powerful force that only comes from Dyson.
